description.narrative: The Australia Council for the Arts International Leadership Program supports international arts professionals from developing countries to participate in the Australia Council’s leadership programs. The aim of the program is to build their capabilities as strong leaders to deliver a resilient, sustainable and vibrant arts sector in their country. Participants gain enhanced confidence and capabilities to think and work more strategically and build relationships and networks to influence change. The program supports Australia’s public diplomacy objectives by building a greater intercultural understanding and the development of international support networks across the Indo-Pacific region. The total estimated value of this investment is $0.8 million to be expensed over 4 years, starting during the 2018-19 financial year.
